features: Helps Wash Away Fungus, Bacteria and Viruses from the Gym: Protects from common causes of jock itch, ringworm, athlete's foot, tinea pedis by reinforcing your skin's natural defense barrier
Gentle on Sensitive Skin: Our cold process hand-made bar soap is the remedy for cleaning skin that needs to wash away grime while taking extra care not to damage irritated skin further

Organic and Natural Ingredients – Our Body and Face Soap Bars have NO Preservatives, Petroleum, Silicone, Sulfate, Synthetic Fragrance, Triclosan, Triclocarban or Dyes Commonly Found in other Gels, Lotions, Creams and Ointments. Made in the USA
Awesome for Sweaty Athletes of All Varieties: Mixed Martial Arts, Self Defense, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, Karate, Wrestling, Football, Powerlifters, Yoga, Rugby and more.
Deodorizes and Refreshes Funky Feet: Don't Let Your Workout Funk scare off your friends. Wash up with a great smelling natural soap bar to get rid of smelly body odor

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Moisturize Your Skin and Keep it Happy in 3 Steps Step 1: Wash Affected Area Use shield soap to wash your skin. Washing away surface contaminants. Step 2: Apply Shield Cream to Skin Use shield cream directly on dry areas of skin. The essential oil mixture will have time to sit on your skin and soak in. Apply 2-3 times daily as needed until skin is back to normal. Step 3: Wash for long term cleanliness As a first line of defense, you can keep using shield soap as your every day soap after your skin is back to normal. The soap acts as a first step to wash away grime you might pick up at the gym.
Wash Off Surface Grime with Shield Bar Soap and Shampoo Bar Wash your skin with our bar soap to get rid of surface contaminants. Use the shampoo bar to clean your hair and scalp.

Apply Shield Cream to Dry Skin Using our deep moisturizing shield cream on your skin allows our unique blend of essential oils to work on ridding you of dry skin over a longer period of time. Applying the cream to your skin allows the essential oils to soak into your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My wife bought this soap for me due to some skin issues I was having. I thought it was a stupid idea. Soap is soap. Wrong. If you want a soap that foams up great (like I do) this is the one. Makes your skin feel great and smells good also. Has really helped my skin. This is not one of those foo foo girlish soaps. Get it you won't regret it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best post training soap
reviews.reviewText: My skin loves it, smells good, and lasts a good while if you keep dry after using

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good everyday soap to combat fungus.
reviews.reviewText: Good soap to have on hand if you live in a place with fungus and moisture. I use it on my hands and feet after gardening, and keep a bar in my nud room to remove any spores I may pick up while working outside near my pond. It smells good, gets me clean and lasts a long time. it's excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cleansing and moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: My husband really likes this because it helps with itchy skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I had such horrible athletes foot on both of my feet. It had spread to the tops of both feet and was starting up my legs. I had don't everything over the counter I could, and everything else I knew to do to my stuff at home..hot water to wash, changing socks frequently, cLysoled my work shoes...it was just getting worse. I started using this God send, and in two days I could already feel a difference. This soap is lightly scented, lathers very well, but needs to be allowed to dry in bw uses. After almost two weeks of using, it's all but gone. My feet look 10000% better thanks to this soap. It probably literally saved my feet. Buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Product, but.....
reviews.reviewText: I'm not saying this product isn't good; it's just not good for me. I thought it might help me with this fungal rash that I have, but it caused the area to get really red and somewhat itchy. I have an autoimmune problem so anything new might get a reaction. That being, I stopped using the product because of my situation, but the product might be good for someone else. I couldn't give the product 5 stars, but I didn't want to give it 1 star either; so I stayed in the middle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These bars are great for dry itchy skin in the winter, especially your feet and elbows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't melt in the dish
reviews.reviewText: I got this product because being winter I have very dry itchy skin. I thought I would try this because I also get Athletes foot every now and again , so I thought this would also keeping a step ahead of that issue. I really love the lemon smell.

Leaves me feeling clean and not slimy, it smells great and a little goes a long way. I’ve used it everyday since I got it and the bar still is the same size. Keep it on a soap saver and you are good to go!

In two minds about giving this review...its such an amazing product I would prefer to keep it a secret...but fair is fair and so I've decided to give this review. Its is an exceptional product. I'm onto my second bar of soap and have already ordered another 6 (panicked for a moment when it was showing as no longer available on both the Amazon and Solar sites) - but the new stock is in and all is good in the World :-). The product has a great smell, it really, really lathers up, and I just feel so totally clean after I shower. The soap bar is very "soft" so it can seem to vanish - recommend you keep it away from the shower stream. Others recommend cutting it up into smaller pieces to make it last longer... either way, this is an exceptional soap, and it will significantly reduce any general BO or other athlete related "issues".

I’m super happy with this soap. I’ve had a pretty large rash for a few years now and have tried multiple topical steroid creams, and after using this soap for about a month, it’s almost completely cleared up. I really hated using oily, smelly creams; so this was a fantastic find! There’s no gross residue, and it actually smells quite good. I keep my soap in a standard plastic soap box when I’m not using it, and I’ve used less than 1/3 of the bar in the last month, so I’m very happy with the value and the overall result!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing soap, a lot more expensive
reviews.reviewText: This is such an amazing soap, I was really sad to see the price skyrocket on the 6 pack. When I was going to purchase, it sat at a pricey but fair 50 dollars. It soared to 100,and went back down to 87.If you can, grab it at it's regular price, it is such a great all over soap. Powerful without stripping your skin.
Not shore if this products Works to be honest.
